EmailTemplate.name: BBLG networking event 2016
EmailTemplate.subject: National Citizen Service networking event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Good morning to all our fantastic NCS partners,
We look forward to welcoming you to our South East London Networking Event!
This is a great opportunity to meet a wide range of professionals from across all boroughs from a variety of sectors and find out more about the NCS programme and how you can be involved.
- Celebrate the launch of the National Citizen Service summer 2016 Programme
- Learn how to incorporate the NCS Programme into your work
- Network with other businesses, charities, social enterprises & community groups in your area and beyond
Refreshments provided. Please sign up here to guarantee your place and a plus one who will benefit!
WHEN
Wednesday, 16 March 2016 from 15:00 to 17:00
WHERE
Waterloo Action Centre - 14 Baylis Road, London SE1 7AA
Follow this link to sign up and guarantee your space with a plus one who will benefit too!
We look forward to seeing you there.
Best wishes,
The Greenwich, Lewisham and Bromley NCS teams!
